introduction.title: Our Team
introduction.subTitle:
Swedish, Canadian, New Zealander, French, Pakistani,
Mexican, South African and Vietnamese

description.title: Meet the nitecans
description.subTitle: Diversity is the new hierarchy
description.description: Our team consists of 180 people from different practices and backgrounds, all with years of experience and certificates of talent. What ties us together, you ask? - The passion we have for our individual works (and the very nurturing HR policies).

teams.name: Pelle Niklasson
teams.title: Chief Executive Officer
teams.description: Thanks to our consistent growth, we've won our second consecutive Deloitte Fast 50 Central Europe award. This prestigious award is presented annually to top performing technology companies from Central Europe.
